00485  public function CMStyle($style = '') {
00486   if(trim($style) != '')
00487    $this->setCSS($style);
00488  }
00489  
00494  public function __toString() {
00495   return $this->getCSS();
00496  }
00497  
00501  public function getCSS() {
00502   $vars = get_object_vars($this);
00503   $r = '';
00504   
00505   foreach($vars as $k => $v) {
00506    // get the css property name
00507    $name = '';
00508    for($i = 0; $i < strlen($k); ++$i) {
00509     $ch = substr($k, $i, 1);
00510     if(strtolower($ch) == $ch)
00511      $name .= $ch;
00512     else
00513      $name .= '-' . strtolower($ch);
00514    }
00515    
00516    if($v !== false)
00517     $r .= " $name: $v;";
00518   }
00519   
00520   return trim($r);
00521  }
00522  
00523 }
